column5: We are leaving our home in RRFN due to a housing crisis. Our family is just too big for our home. We almost moved this summer but found alot of issues with the house, which was a huge bummer cause the property was awesome. Now we found a semi secluded house, huge place with a great layout. About 10 acres of land! Nice birdhunting road out the backyard. Pinewood river beside the house leading into rainy river in front of the property. Right at the mouth of LOTW's, and a 20 minute drive from my ice fishing grounds on LOTW's. So stoked, and kids are very happy:)
Wow man, count your blessings! A lot of us could only dream of that life.  Congrats on your new homestead.  G
It also comes with a treehouse:) huge bonus for our kids! We will miss RRFN but had little to no choice. A parting shot as we left the water tonight after catching many walleyes;)
Horrible! (Insert sarcasm here) good luck with the huge move!
Thanks gerritt! Cant wait to explore new waters for some reports:)
Very cool. Think i know the area on 11 where the pinewood enters into Rainy. Congrats!
Good luck in the new place
Very happy to hear congratulations.  Art
Congrats... I hope it turns out exactly like you hope! Beautiful spot. HH

Thanks for the replies! Were very excited to move! Good news is by the time were in and settled it should be ice season:)  Spooled, if you know the area feel free to hit me up some advice lol. Furthest I usually go is the long souix rapids so I dont know the pinewood area at all.  Thanks again.
This move sounds good,all the best in your move,and fishing,sounds spectacular!!!!!!!!!!
nice  living the dream
When it rains it pours! New job starting tuesday as well!!!! Guess where? 5 mins from our new house woot woot!!!!!
Pinch yourself..maybe you're dreaming.  If it hurts, get to work...
buy a lotto ticket before that sucker rusts Congrats
Lotto ticket bought, and some beer. Off to take measurements at the house tomorrow then hockey:) back to work tuesday morning:)
yup, starts with 10 acres or so, then you'll end up like Chad with more land than any man really needs
exploring the back 40 will be great for the kids. I haven't hit every nook and cranny of our 11 acres yet
Great news by the sounds of things.  Good luck with the new homestead.
Great news all around, congrats on what sounds like an amazing new home and the new job!!!  Maureen
